# Tools to check for ADA compliance

* [https://www.w3.org/WAI/standards-guidelines/wcag/](https://www.w3.org/WAI/standards-guidelines/wcag/)

WCAG are guidelines, internationally accepted, describing how to make web content more accessible to people with disabilities.

* [https://wave.webaim.org/](https://wave.webaim.org/) WAVE provides a plugin for a browser making it easy and informative to check for Web Content Accessibility Guideline (WCAG) errors.
